duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for Engineering activities that involve environment and application build out, setting up new data feeds, clustering and load balancing activities using industry leading tools & technologies.
Provide ongoing production support including incident, change, and release management activities.
Participate in global on-call rotation to ensure platform availability and stability.
Utilize well established Enterprise standards, processes, and procedures to ensure Engineering activities are delivered in a timely fashion with high quality of work product.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent technology discipline.
